name: BFSAR Sound Archive
summary: A BFSAR files is an archive that contains multiple .BFWAV audio files used by the Mario Kart 8 (MK8) game for Nintendo Wii U and Switch. It stores sound effects that are played during races and when navigating game menus. BFSTM files replaced .BRSTM and .BCSTM files, which are commonly used by Wii and 3DS games.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
